movies.title: Errors of the Human Body
movies.plot: Seeking a new laboratory to pursue his controversial genetic research, Dr Geoff Burton takes up a position at the world-renowned Institute for Molecular Cell Biology & Genetics in wintry Dresden, Germany. His contribution to their most top-secret project - a human regeneration gene - has the potential to make something miraculous out of a personal tragedy that has haunted him for years. But when he uncovers a conspiracy amongst his colleagues, he finds instead something quite different: a terrifying new virus, with potentially devastating consequences for humanity - and for Geoff, who is not only its first victim, but its unwitting source.
movies.simplePlot: When a potentially lethal virus is created within his new lab, Dr Geoff Burton is shocked to discover he is not only the unwitting cause, but also its first victim.

biography.bio: Michael Eklund was born in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan, Canada. He is an actor and producer, known for The Call (2013), Watchmen (2009) and Eadweard (2015). He was previously married to Megan Bennett and Erin MacGilvray.
biography.name: Michael Eklund

biography.bio: Karoline Herfurth was born on May 22, 1984 in Berlin, Germany. She is an actress and director, known for Un prof pas comme les autres (2013), The Reader (2008) and Le parfum - Histoire d'un meurtrier (2006).
biography.name: Karoline Herfurth

biography.bio: Tómas Lemarquis was born on August 3, 1977 in Iceland. He is an actor, known for Noi l'albinos (2003), Snowpiercer - le transperceneige (2013) and 3 Days to Kill (2014).
biography.name: Tómas Lemarquis

biography.bio: Rik Mayall, one of the first and foremost alternative comedians in the UK, was born in a village called Matching Tye, just outside Harlow in Essex. His parents, John and Gillian were both drama teachers. His acting debut was at the age of seven when he appeared in one of his father's stage plays. He met his comedy partner and best friend Adrian "Ade" Edmondson at Manchester University in 1975. Soon he and Ade began performing together as a comedy act called "Twentieth Century Coyote" at the now legendary Comedy Store in London. They later moved their act to a venue called "The Comic Strip" and it was there that they were discovered by producer Paul Jackson. Rik and his friends such as Adrian Edmondson, Jennifer Saunders, Dawn French, Alexei Sayle, Peter Richardson and Nigel Planer were boomed onto television screens with immense success. He wrote The Young Ones (1982) with Ben Elton and Lise Mayer. You loved it or you hated it, but you can't deny the impact it had on British Sitcom. His career was launched, and at only twenty-four years of age he became one of the most popular comedians in Britain. He wrote and starred in various other series and films over the years such as The New Statesman (1987); his role in it as Alan B'Stard earned him a BAFTA. He had his brief touch of Hollywood in 1991 when he starred as the title role in Drop Dead Fred (1991), but he soon returned to the British TV screens with Bottom (1991) a show which only ran for 3 seasons from 1991 to 1995 but was so popular that he and his co-star Adrian Edmondson toured with live shows based on the series around Britain every two years or so up until 2014. In 1998 he had a severe accident and ended up in a coma after he crashed with his quad-bike at his farm in Devon. Luckily he recovered and starred in films and shows such as Guest House Paradiso (1999) and Day of the Sirens (2002). In 2002 he proved that he was back and ready for action in the comedy series Believe Nothing (2002) which reunited him with Laurence Marks and Maurice Gran, the writers of "The New Statesman". In 2003 he toured the UK alongside Adrian Edmondson with the fifth Bottom Live show.
biography.name: Rik Mayall

biography.bio: Caroline Gerdolle is an actress and writer, known for Errors of the Human Body (2012), God in My Pocket (2006) and Ma soeur est moi (2008).
biography.name: Caroline Gerdolle

biography.bio: Yusuke Yamasaki is an actor, known for Errors of the Human Body (2012), Hi-Fi (2013) and Love.Com: The Movie (2006).
biography.name: Yusuke Yamasaki

biography.bio: Ulrich Meinecke was born in 1975. He is an actor, known for Errors of the Human Body (2012), Sunshine (2016) and Like (2012).
biography.name: Ulrich Meinecke

biography.bio: Iván González was born on February 17, 1973 in Madrid, Spain as Jairo Iván González. He is an actor, known for The Divide (2011), The Roldans (2004) and Crossing Lines (2013). He has been married to Cecilia Stola since July 1, 2006.
biography.name: Iván González

biography.bio: It looks like we don't have any Biography for Usha Rani yet.
biography.name: Usha Rani

biography.bio: Vincent De Ville was born on October 23, 1976 in Hungary as Csomai Zoltán. He is a producer and actor, known for Errors of the Human Body (2012), The Real Santa (2005) and Ultra (2003).
biography.name: Vincent De Ville

biography.bio: Christian Mock is an actor, known for Errors of the Human Body (2012), When the Finger Points at the Moon (2011) and Nacht über Berlin (2013).
biography.name: Christian Mock

biography.bio: Sienna Farall is an actress, known for Insidious: Chapter 2 (2013), Errors of the Human Body (2012) and Malignant (2013).
biography.name: Sienna Farall

biography.bio: Dina Welch is an actress, known for Errors of the Human Body (2012).
biography.name: Dina Welch
